item.title: MDS Block 4
item.description: My experience and thoughts on block 4 of MDS at UBC. The courses were: DSCI 532, DSCI 563, DSCI 572, and DSCI 573.

item.title: MDS Block 3
item.description: My experience and thoughts on block 3 of MDS at UBC. The courses were: DSCI 513, DSCI 522, DSCI 561, and DSCI 571.

item.title: MDS Block 2
item.description: My experience and thoughts on block 2 of MDS at UBC. The courses were: DSCI 512, DSCI 523, DSCI 531, and DSCI 552.
